attributes.additional_details:
This is a ban that will affect local businesses and people who reside in the countryside this is a attempt against the people of the countryside it is an attack on our culture trail hunting is a great place for people to connect and make friends in a fun sport for all involved.
I would wish that you could reconsider this ban and look into what you are banning a harmless sport which brings people together 
Thank you - Kyle
attributes.background: I would wish you to stop the harmless sport of trail hunting,it's is a big part of British heritage and is a rural lifestyle I would like you to consider how this is unfair on people who reside in the countryside and make their living there trail hunting brings people together to make new friends.

rejection.details: You may wish to sign this petition, which calls for the same action: "Stop the ban on trail hunting" https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/755123
